concept.title: Air Travel Module overview
concept.shortdesc: The Air Travel module loads airport and flight data from two comma-separated text files and provides query functions for city/country filtering, direct or one-stop routes, and return flights.

conbody.p: The module builds two in-memory caches: allAirports (airport code → Airport) and allFlights (origin code → list of Flight).

section.title: Audience
section.p: Developers, QA, and support teams who need to understand inputs, outputs, and expected behaviors.

ul.li: Load and normalize airport/flight rows (trim whitespace and remove tabs).
Query flights by city or country (origin or destination matches).
Find direct flights or single-hop connections (origin → X → destination).
Find a return flight (destination → origin) for an existing flight.

section.title: Files documented
section.p: Core behavior is implemented in Assign4.py, using the data model classes Airport and Flight.
